fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fire tears at a player within your range, attacking them.
- (Familiar) Fire a tear at a player, which will tell you two roles - one of which is their actual role.
- (Tainted Bonus) Investigative abilities used on you have a 50% chance to give incorrect results.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Has a chance to replace Isaac (3718) if it spawns.
- In your familiar form, you have no defense.
Damage: 1 (Basic)
Range: 5
Luck: 0%

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Fight back against all who oppose you. (Basement goal)
